website_summaries.verdict: A mortar and pestle set with silicone edges for a no-slip ingredient prep experience.
pros: Silicone grip makes pestle easy to hold
Both parts can go in the dishwasher
Bottom of bowl features a silicone ring so it stays put when in use
Crushes just as well as a traditional set
cons: Heavier than some users expected and a little tough to fit inside the dishwasher

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to crush garlic. At my second use only, the bottom of it broke off, leaving it with a huge hole at its bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Ensar Demirkan

customer_reviews.title: Great mortar and pestle! New design review
customer_reviews.text: Great mortar and pestle set! I have the new design with the sturdy bottom and haven’t had any issues at all. Super easy to do things with from start to finish. It mashes things beautifully and cleans great too! I use my mortar and pestle to mash garlic for making rice and I use it daily. I used to have a wooden mortar and pestle and having one that is porcelain is definitely a huge upgrade. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: If you use this to grind spices, and use a little extra force, the base will crack open.
customer_reviews.author: Aarthy Vaidyanathan

customer_reviews.title: Small but heavy and durable
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product was going to be small and lightweight but was pleasantly surprised by the weight and appearance of the Mortar and Pestle. Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ree

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it about 3 months ago. Rarely used it. Two days ago when my wife used it to crush some ginger, it broke at the bottom. A piece just broke off leaving a hole at the bottom. Pictures are attached.
customer_reviews.author: Venkatagiri Venkatasamy

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for cooking purposes.
customer_reviews.text: Today I finally got around to using this mortar and pestle and boy was I disappointed. I was making a paste for a marinade which called for black peppercorns, cilantro stems, and garlic. Long before the ingredients could be turned into a paste the bottom of the mortar burst right out. This product may be good for grinding up pills but it isn't useful in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: BFD

customer_reviews.title: I got it to replace an old broken mortar and pestle and I am so happy I got this one
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those "just right" items. I got it to replace an old broken mortar and pestle and I am so happy I got this one. It is handsome, durable, DISHWASHER safe! It grinds herbs beautifully. The people who sell it are very helpful and want to encourage it's use in other ways as well, I love mine.
customer_reviews.author: Veronika

customer_reviews.title: From now on  this is a kitchen essential!
customer_reviews.text: Magnificent! I have been using a pill crusher given to my by the hospital. It was EXTREMELY difficult to use. My arthritic hands were most unhappy. I just received this mortar and pestle today and used it to pulverize the same pills I've been crushing every day. What a difference! Pulverized them in seconds with no discomfort at all to my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Gaston

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't change a thing...
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time buying and using a mortar and pestle. I'm 100% happy. I wasn't sure what to look for exactly in this kind of product, but I looked at many other ones and read their reviews. The other products had problems with staining, size, paint coming off, breaking, uncomfortable, scratching counter tops from sliding. This product is made perfectly with no issues. It's a perfect size, has silicone on the bottom to prevent sliding and scratching, silicone grip on the pestle so your hand doesn't hurt and it is a comfortable shape, is a perfect size and even dishwasher safe. I highly recommend this product and would be shocked if someone didn't love theirs.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Z

customer_reviews.title: Time to plagiarize,... “jez do it”.
customer_reviews.text: Crushes it up into the finest powder I could want - “it” being a vast array of supplements. It’s important to me that my ratios are as close as possible. And that means NO CHUNKS. So,... I purchased this guy. And,... my supplement blends couldn’t be any closer to the results for which I had hoped. Solid. Heavy. Quality. Worth every cent that I paid. The silicone base non-slip is nice to keep it steady for when you really want to put your back into it. 5 STARS all the way. And, it’s nice to support a small family-style business with the help of Amazon to expand this company’s reach. I couldn’t be happier. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Muleskinner

customer_reviews.title: It seems silly to be so happy about something so simple but I can't help it
customer_reviews.text: It seems silly to be so happy about something so simple but I can't help it. This Mortar and pestle is fantastic. I wasn't sure how I would feel about the silicone on the handle but I love it. The set is a nice size, fits in my hand easily. The silicone on the bottom is excellent, I wouldn't have broken my old one if it had this feature. Thank you Cooler Kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy M

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! After a quite extensive search desired to try this one, based on reviews. The mortar is great! Very sturdy and beautifully looking. Rubber legs keep it stable on the countertop . My daughter uses it for mixing herbs. Works perfect. No cracks, no dust particles, like in granite or marble. Great price too. Love the product!
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Freedland

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy mortar and pestle
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice mortar/pestle set! It's easy to clean, a nice size, and the rubber base makes it non-slip. Very happy with this product! Edit: after a few weeks of use it cracked into pieces and is unusable now. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with a small hole in the pestle. I wrote the company about it but they never got back with me with a solution after initially saying that they would. A note that came with the item requested direct correspondence with the company if there were any problems since they are smaller and family-run. I can't use it with a pit in the head of the pestle that would accumulate ground up matter and be hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Mounce

customer_reviews.title: When not in use, makes a handy paperweight
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice item to have around. People will ask what is it, and why do you have one. The dumber the question, feel free to demonstrate the use on one of the fingers of the dummy saying it is a way to make the fingers look nice. Now, for those that want to know how well does it work. I grow my own garlic, and dry it for latter usage. All that needs to be done is to take a couple of the garlic flakes, and grind away until it turns into powder. It is also good at grinding dried chilies into powder for cooking. Or, for that matter, any seeds needed for cooking.
customer_reviews.author: hyojun

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love my mortar and pestle. I can crush my herbs with ease, and it brings out their flavor in my food. I also use it with seaweed pieces to crush them up. This way I do not get surprise chunks when I eat. I love it so much, I got one for my sister, too The rubber bottom comes right off for easy washing, and the slips right back on. I love the rubber bottom because it keeps the mortar from slipping and leaving marks on my counter. I got the smaller version (4.5) and it was more than enough. It was the perfect weight, too.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this mortar and pestle. I searched for one that was heavy with a nonskid base because I have limited use of one hand. I needed something that would be secure, not tip, or slide on the counter and I am totally satisfied. It is easy to pour the crushed pills as well as very easy to clean. I can't find anything I would change after three weeks of use. Thanks for a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money. Do not buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: While crushing some ginger the mortar broke. It wasn't even used regularly and the product didn't last 1 month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EZ-Grip Silicone & Porcelain Mortar and Pestle With Non-Slip Detachable Silicone Bas
customer_reviews.text: It took a while before I was able to use due to some circumstances in my life but once I did, I was in love. It fits my needs perfectly and so far I have been quite pleased with this purchase. I like the small size for storage since I don't have space to store on counter. I haven't tried some tougher herbs like basil as yet but hopefully it will perform just as well with those as it has with garlic, ginger and Italian parsley. Bravo and/or Brava to your designers on a job well done!
customer_reviews.author: Garden of Eden

customer_reviews.title: Silicon comes off very easily
customer_reviews.text: The black rubber silicon comes off quite easily. I picked up the mortar by the black silicon base and it came off causing the mortar to fall onto the counter. They tell you to contact them with a website etc but none of that info exists. So I guess there is no customer service. However, I mostly use it for crushing up garlic and it works fine for what I need. It does need a thorough cleaning after use or else it will pick up the smell of what was crushed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Well made and solid!
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid mortar and pestle. I love the way the rubber bottom grips the counter, and the etched interior of the bowl on the inside. This thing feels sturdy and well made, like it will last for many years. I’m very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use.  Very Useful Tool!
customer_reviews.text: We have an Aussie who is very suspicious of pills. I’m assuming the “easy to swallow” pertains to makes hard pills easier to swallow once crushed. Doing this early morning & first thought was—I couldn’t swallow this thing. It’s substantial! 🤪And, amazingly—this makes it easier for her. This is a very sturdy mortar & pestle and stays in place on the counter due to the removable silicone base. Very neat. Also Both of us in this household have lots of arthritis in our hands (mid-70’s) and I was amazed that we can both easily use this. Thank you for such a useful tool. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Mortar and pestle for many uses, besides pet pills!
customer_reviews.text: I am actually using this to crush a cat pill into a fine powder, and then to mix that powder into my cat's wet food. It works like a charm! You don't need to move the pestle--you just bear down on it and the pill becomes powder. Am also going to buy a tiny artist paint brush to empty the mortar contents into my cat's food. I have recommended it to all the cat owners I know. I chose this one because porcelain (unlike rough stone) doesn't transfer odors when used, so I will also use it for food items. I like the silicone ring around the base so it doesn't slide on the counter top.
customer_reviews.author: pattilicious

customer_reviews.title: I bought it as a present, but I want to keep it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so pleased with this. I got it for my future daughter-in-law and I think it will turn into an heirloom piece. It's solid and robust and beautiful in its simplicity. The 'rubber' grip ring on the base of the mortar works really well, and the same material on the pestle handle makes it easy and comfortable to hold. Barring accidents, this will be an indispensable kitchen tool for generations to come.
customer_reviews.author: BayouBrit

customer_reviews.title: Very utile item for your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for most everyday kitchen needs. Solid, with a slghtly abrasive bottom to help grind but not so abrasive that ingredients get caught in the crevices. The non-slip bottom is a plus. The whole unit cleans up easily without leaving stains from pepercorns or saffron, etc. It was delivered quickly from Cooler KItchen in great condition, packaged nicely. I may look for a smaller unit as well (I have a larger) for tiny items such as saffron, however, this size will work fine for that if a smaller unit is not available.
customer_reviews.author: Prince of Peas

customer_reviews.title: but this pestle and mortar does a great job of that
customer_reviews.text: So far I have used this only for pulverizing dog biscuits, but this pestle and mortar does a great job of that. The silicone grips prevent slippage, both in your hand and on the table. The fine-textured interior of the mortar provides just enough friction to make a good powder but doesn't impede movement of the pestle. Over the decades I have used several different pestles and mortar: wood, metal, stone, and this is easily the most effective, partly because the object to be crushed doesn't slip around in the mortar. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: pskils

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: The silicone base and handle make using this mortar and pestle easy to use. There is little to no slipping of the mortar even on a slick granite counter top. The silicone on the handle protects the hand even when using a lot of pressure. The steep sides keep the spices form making their escape - peppercorns get crushed instead of flying across the kitchen. So far, a little warm water and the M&P are back to like new clean - I haven't even needed to use soap, just a rinse and dry.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Item is cracked and chipped after 2 months of use
customer_reviews.text: This item is only a few months old and all I have used it for is to grind a couple of pills each day (for my dog). Somehow it is already cracked and has a small chip out of the side. It has not moved from my kitchen counter since I started using it (it arrived in good shape), so I don't know why it is cracked from only grinding a couple of pills. I certainly would not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: New Mother

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, clean looking product
customer_reviews.text: The mortar and pestle arrived in great condition, were easy to clean, and feel like they have enough weight and rough surface to grind herbs to a fine powder. The box, on the other hand, was pretty beat up. The outer cardboard was bent , as was pieces of the internal cardboard. This may have been due to the amazon box having far too much extra space, even with the other orders in there, causing the products to rattle and dent each other in transit. Other than that, it looks like a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Very nice-looking and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful kitchen tool. I ordered it because I needed a mortar and pestle heavier than the one I use now for crushing pills up for my cat and mixing them in baby food so she’ll get her meds. Unfortunately, this thing is SO heavy I have difficulty pouring the pill powder into the baby food, so I won’t be using it much for now. But it looks so good I’m leaving out on the kitchen counter for decoration!
customer_reviews.author: Jane E. Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: Great Mortar
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made mortar and pestle. Perfect size for my use and the rubber gasket on the bottom keeps it from sliding. There is also grip that keeps your hand from sliding. It does exactly what I need it to do and is the perfect addition to my kitchen. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: dcbevents

customer_reviews.title: Works as Stated
customer_reviews.text: I just had the chance to use my EZ-Grip Silicone & Ceramic Mortar and Pestle... I used it on egg shells, did a great job on turning them to a powder form... I also love the fact that it has a rubber bottom which keeps mortar from sliding, the rubber grip on the Pestel allows for a firm grip even if wet... Would not recommend it for anyone with arthritis symptoms in wrist or hands... I'm not a doctor but its just a lot of work within the wrist and requires a firm grip in my opinion..
customer_reviews.author: Musashi

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the quality of this product. The pictures do not capture the sturdiness of it. I was very impressed upon unboxing. The size also took me by surprised. I did not pay attention to the dimensions. I see it is a multipurpose mortar which will be put to use. I like the nonskid feature to hold it in place. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: quietstorm1050

customer_reviews.title: Not good for grinding medications
customer_reviews.text: If you are considering this for grinding hard pills which are medications for you or your pet and dosage is important this is not the mortar you want. Once ground the powder whether coarse or fine ground sticks to the bottom and is almost impossible to get all of it out. Probably fine for herbs and nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Firewolf

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in shattered pieces!
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't know anything about this product as it came to me shattered into 5 pieces with the ring at the bottom of the box. So sturdiness must be a 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Munoz

customer_reviews.title: No lightweight
customer_reviews.text: The EZ-Grip Silicone & Porcelain Mortar and Pestle is no lightweight, believe me. When buying this Mortar and Pestle you are buying a very attractive, substantial piece of cooking equipment. I am very, very happy with my purchase. While it may be considered a little on the pricey side, in my opinion, it is worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Sharyn

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed, efficient, high quality Mortar & Pestle
customer_reviews.text: I unpacked the EZ-Grip M&P in front of a design-conscious friend, who snatched it and "I must have this." So I gave it to him as a belated birthday gift, and ordered another for myself. Got it, love it. It's heavy, non-slip, handsome and functional. Worth every penny. I'm a semi-retired cook. So nice, I bought it twice.
customer_reviews.author: Wry Me

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to crush my husband's medications when he had a feeding tube. It worked great for that, with only one flaw. I understand that the bottom and inside of the mortar couldn't be slick/polished because it would scratch and get all messed up by all the crushing of the pestle, but with that being said, it not being polished caused us to not be able to get all the medication out of the mortar. There was always a coating of crushed meds left behind, even with scraping. Other than that, it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: OBrid2004

customer_reviews.title: Cure for large smelly pet pills
customer_reviews.text: Our 12 year old dog has a heart condition and has to take a really large and bad smelling pill to help her. Nothing worked at first. Peanut butter, cheese, mixing it with her food and even trying to hide in chicken broth didn't work. She would eat what was around the pill and spit the pill out. But now, with the EZ-Grip, we can "powderize" the pill and spread it onto a piece of lunch meat (preferably ham), make a roll up pressing the pill into the lunch meat and she eats it every time. The EZ Grip works perfectly and we are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: wayne65

customer_reviews.title: I love this item
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. It is heavy enough not to slide all over the place but not enough that I cannot use it. I used it the first day and though I think I have to get use to it I was able to mix several herbs together and made an awesome rub for chicken. It infused the oils of the chives, parsley, basil, garlic and rosemary perfectly. I have an herb garden that is doing well and I have excess herbs so I am going to use it to make herb ice cube that I can just take out of the fridge and add to my favorite dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K Walters

customer_reviews.title: One of the greatest inventions ever!
customer_reviews.text: After fooling around with "toy" pill crushers, experiencing never-ending frustrations twice a day every day, I am downright gleeful over this wonderfully built, elegantly designed, extremely practical and functional mortar & pestle. It's very clean and actually a quite pretty dish and utensil, and its feel is really good. I love its weight (perfect!), and the non-skit base keeps it in place. Did someone say these things have been around for years??? Amazing! Who knew people were that smart in previous centuries??? Well, the modern design and modern materials used in this present day rendition of it is marvelous, honestly it is! Five Stars at least.
customer_reviews.author: Charles H. Hooker Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It's PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: I Love It! It's just what I was looking for.........perfect for my needs. It replaces a wooden mortar and pestle, a family heirloom, that I am gifting my oldest son for Christmas. This one will actually do a better job on garlic and herbs, and it won't slide around on the counter. So happy!!
customer_reviews.author: farm folk

customer_reviews.title: No pour spout
customer_reviews.text: Decent for crushing herbs I guess but no compounding ability since there is no pour spout
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little pestle
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with my peste - easy to use and eay to clean all the while staying in place because of the no skid - I did a lot of research before I bought it and I am so happy I decided on this particular one - meets and exceeds all my needs!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Greb

customer_reviews.title: glaze had many bubbles on the lip.
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is good, but the glaze had many bubbles on the lip. They dipped it into frothy glaze or there was contamination in the glazing process. I almost returned it, but it works fine so I kept it. Just cosmetic flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Hereticus

customer_reviews.title: Great for meds.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. My mom has a feeding tube, and I use this to crush up her meds. Works even better than expected. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Matt H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a way to grind up our cat's medication to put in her food because trying to get a pill down her throat was a joke. This a sturdy mortar and pestle with a nice no-slip base. It makes the job super-quick and easy. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M. Pino

customer_reviews.title: BEST PILL CRUSHER ON THE MARKET
customer_reviews.text: We were watching our granddaughter and we had to crush up pills for her. Pills are so hard to crush up that I got online for pill crushers and I was so impressed with the description of the EZ Grip Silicone and Porcelain Mortar Pedestal Pill Crusher I bought two. One for us and one for the parents. It’s easy to hold easy to clean and easy to store. I would recommend this to anyone that has the crushed up pills. It’s well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality! I love the silicone ring thats prevents movement. I also love the silicone grip. Not too big, not too small. I purchased this to specifically use for my pets medication. Much easier to sneak it into their food. I would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great mortar & pestle for the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Well designed and constructed. Works perfectly to grind spices while cooking. Easy clean up. Most importantly... it is comfortable to grind with. Fits my hand and the silicone bottom holds firmly to the counter. Makes it really easy to grind up dried herbs just before use.
customer_reviews.author: Rodan

customer_reviews.title: JUST WHAT iNEEDED
customer_reviews.text: I bought this particular item after looking over the many on Amazon. I liked what I sw in the design and finish of it and it has so far lived up to my expectations. both the non slip handle and base make this a well thought out item
customer_reviews.author: K.G. Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Besides being perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Besides being perfect for my needs, it's very estheticly appealing. I always wanted one of these to crush and bring spices but never got around to it.. I now have a dog that requires lots of meds and the poor guy runs when he sees me heading his way with pills. Problem solved with my new mortar and pestal! I grind up his meds and hide them in his nice meaty meals. We're both delighted!
customer_reviews.author: San Felipe

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't see on the description the interior Basin and the bottom of the pestle are unfinished rough-textured porcelain. This is precisely what is necessary to grind. This is an important feature that I was looking to have in a mortar and pestle. I am extremely happy with the durability and heavyweight of the base. This product was in fact so heavy it broke all the interior packaging Amazon provided however the mortar and pestle are so substantial and well-made they arrived in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.author: Cathryn D.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, easy to use, good buy
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for a couple of weeks now to grind seeds and nuts and it's perfect for the job. I particularly like the easy grip pestle. I'd buy it again but I don't think this one will ever break!
customer_reviews.author: Bowpooza

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy with non-slip base and handle
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It's sturdy with a nonslip rubber base that can be removed for cleaning. It is just the right size for herbs or pills. The non-slip handle is also wonderful. I am very happy with this choice.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J.

customer_reviews.title: Works okay
customer_reviews.text: Works great but when you grind up pulls into powder it sticks to the inside of the bowl and the grinder thing. I have to get a knife and scrap it all out.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Nehls

customer_reviews.title: New take on the mortar.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great find, beautifully designed and very well made; solid but graceful, nice just to keep on display, but nicely functional as well. It was optimally packaged and arrived promptly. I use a lot of seeds and herbs which are the better for a bit of bruising to release the flavor. I would not, however use the same unit for medicine or other nonfoods, no matter the ease of washing.
customer_reviews.author: Theodora L. Norton

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I want to grind to a powder some salt and sugar for use in an electrolyte supplement. This item works perfectly for that purpose. It is very easy to clean so I will also use it for grinding spices as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen tool!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of this mortar and pedestal. It sits securely on the counter, the hand grip is comfortable and non-slip as well. I would recommend this one to anyone in need of a quality kitchen tool!
customer_reviews.author: Jim B.

customer_reviews.title: it's just okay
customer_reviews.text: Good grinder/crusher, fairly large in size, but one irritating design flaw: The bottom is concave, so you cannot put it in the dishwasher or dish drying rack normally, because the water never evaporates. You have to dry it sideways. Why they didn't just make the bottom flat (with that nice rubber coating), I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: Costero

customer_reviews.title: This Mortar and pestle, is quite awesome
customer_reviews.text: It's made of porcelain, very comfortable to use, will not slip thanks to the removable silicone bottom cover. It's a very high quality made mortar and pestle. Easy to clean. I recommend it to everyone who likes to grind their own spices.
customer_reviews.author: Jose DeSantiago

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. It came well packaged and is perfect in size for my needs. I grind peppercorns, and herbs together to make some favorite dishes that our family love.
customer_reviews.author: Cremekat

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: This is a good size mortar and pestle. So far it works great. I like the grip areas because the other one uses to have used to move a round while I was trying to grind making my job a little difficult. But this one has worked out great
customer_reviews.author: Heidy Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, solid. I did not have to prime it before use. Actually works better than my other one that was a gift. Super easy to use, easy to clean and has a good weight to it
customer_reviews.author: CIndy

customer_reviews.title: Best mortar and pestle I’ve seen
customer_reviews.text: I use to grind up my vitamins to put in smoothies. Clean in dishwasher after removing rubber bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Truman

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this choice
customer_reviews.text: Elegant mortar and pestle gives a modern kitchen a modern look. Sounds funny when you're talking about a mortar and pestle but it really does look great. The rubber at the bottom is very helpful too. It keeps it sticking to your countertop while you grind away.
customer_reviews.author: Chadillac

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding design!
customer_reviews.text: I use a mortar & pestle to grind up the cat food pellets several times a day, and the little one I bought at Pier 1 was pretty but inefficient. The broad base and silicone ring on this mortar make it very stable and quiet. The pestle is bigger and does the job faster, and I love the rubber sleeve. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory K.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty quality mortar and pestle
customer_reviews.text: I have found that the EZ-Grip Silicone & Porcelain Mortar and Pestle is comfortable to use. The large pestle has a softened grip and will not hurt the palm of your hand when crushing and grinding peppercorns and other hard herbs and spices. A good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Henry W

customer_reviews.title: a well-designed addition to the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice addition to my kitchen. It is quite heavy and with a non-slip base, both of which make it very stable. The exterior of the mortar is glazed making it attractive and pleasant to handle, while the interior is unglazed as is the pestle which aids in grinding. In addition my order was received in a timely fashion and well-packaged to prevent damage in shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Leathem

customer_reviews.title: Love the modern style and durability
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my husband, a dedicated home-chef, for Christmas. He agreed that it is a great design for a mortar and pestle. The rubbery base is such a good idea and works really well. I like the modern look of this, as so many of the options out there look much more like antiques than new kitchen utensils.
customer_reviews.author: N. Moore

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for grinding the freshly dried basil from my garden. The rubber bottom keeps it firmly in place and is easily removed for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Davila

customer_reviews.title: Very well thought modern mortar and pestle
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a mortar for my wife a bit different from the common stone/granite available everywhere. She immediately loved it! Modern look, very easy to clean and with the silicon base that provide a firm grip and eliminate noise, she use it almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: A Pellegrineschi

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This mortar and pestle is very heavy and sturdy. It feels substantial, and the rubber handle makes it a breeze to use. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: High quality mortar and pestle, great for home use.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great for grinding up the dog’s meds. The silicon handle and foot really grip the countertop and make grinding go so much faster and easier. Lab grade Porcelain.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Works Great to Smash Avacaodos
customer_reviews.text: This works great to smash/mash avocados for when I make Avocado toast. So far it seems like the product is pretty durable, and I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This mortar and pestle are so easy to use and extremely sturdy. The no slip bottom and grip make it perfect for grinding. I would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Great mortar and pestle
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it for peppercorns as of yet but it works just as you'd expect. It's a bit hefty but I consider it a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle L.

customer_reviews.title: I haven't used it yet but it was exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I have some baking projects that I'd like to explore, but haven't had the right tools to do what I want yet. I was really happy to find this device, and it looks like it will do the trick! The design was appealing for the silicon base, and the nice clean color, and the quality of the weight. I really like it, but I haven't used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: This mortar and pestle set is just the right size for my needs. The weight and no slip bottom are superior. The items are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to grind up saffron from time to time, small imperfection on the handle part but no big deal at this price... looks steeze mcgeeze...
customer_reviews.author: nima bean

customer_reviews.title: Mortar & pestle essential for home-grown herbs.
customer_reviews.text: With our garden producing more herbs, I decided it was time to purchase a mortar and pestle to crush them. This one is easy to clean, and the rubber bottom keeps it from sliding on the cabinet when crushing the herbs. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Ozark Sam

customer_reviews.title: EZ-Grip Silicone & Porcelain Mortar and Pestle With Non-Slip Detachable Silicone Base
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy crushed. I crush neds for a client and it pulverizes them to a fine powder. It doesnt slip and is a great size. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carm

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love
customer_reviews.text: I had fiddled around with other mortars and pestles before this one, so I especially appreciate the heft, efficiency, and overall quality of this one. The silicone base gives a firm grip, and the pestle and mortar work efficiently together. After a hard week, grinding whole toasted spices was just what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sharpless

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!! Could not be happier!
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly sturdy, durable and looks great too! It’s not rough inside like others I read about and the integrity of the product is undeniable! I was depending on the reviews of others not my own experience is now of the same beliefs: awesome! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Terrific--non slip[!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this several times with great success. What a difference not to have the thing sliding around and slipping (and spilling!) all over the cabinet. This one beats all others. So easy to clean! Would make a great gift for someone who grows herbs at home.
customer_reviews.author: Big Kitten

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.text: I bought for use to grind up ingredients for brewing as well as for my hot sauces and it works great. Easy to clean without fear of cross contamination.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus C. McKee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and useful!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting to get a mortar for a while now and I was glad to see this one on a flash sale. It is beautiful and functional. I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Metairie

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: This mortar and pestle are well worth the money. The pestle has a rubber grip to help you keep a good grasp while you're crushing things. The mortar has a removable rubber bottom so that it won't slide. I chose to remove that when I cleaned it in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Handle!
customer_reviews.text: The handle is a great size and shape for my arthritic hands. I put it through the dishwasher before I used it and it did very well!
customer_reviews.author: K. F.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got this product because I needed a mortar and pestle. It works really well and feels very sturdy and is super easy to clean. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Molly S

customer_reviews.title: good quality mortar and pestle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primarily to use to crush medication into a fine powder for someone who has difficulty swallowing, and it works perfectly for that. It's a very well made, sturdy product. The pestle fits the bowl of the mortar precisely, so you can always get an even, thorough grind. The silicone handle and base is a great, practicle addition, too--makes for a more comfortable grip and stable base.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Toole

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sturdy & beautiful product!😃 I tried to thank the supplier for the product and their prompt delivery, but Etsy wouldn't let me! ☹️ Boo to etsy...
customer_reviews.author: katherine k. klay

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I use it to grind my dried herbs. Cleans up great and sticks in place on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: GsGood

customer_reviews.title: Too smooth of a surface for grinding!!
customer_reviews.text: #1 the bowl inside surface is smooth! Last one I had a rough surface so you could quickly grind your spices. This one is stupid and poorly designed. Also hate the stupid non slip bottom cover that just gets in tge way.
customer_reviews.author: ch

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to crush egg shells for the garden. I picked this one for the silicone grips. It was comfortable to use and worked well. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: CBoyle

customer_reviews.title: Works fine despite lumpy pestle
customer_reviews.text: The pestle is a little lumpy, not smooth and round. I bought this to powder sugar and it works fine. Like others have said, a layer of powder sticks to the mortar, and there's not much to be done about it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to use, & best of all it can go in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: dinodoc

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to any kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: I make many custom spice rubs, this works great for reducing size and enhancing flavor. No slip base and handle are great! Easy clean up and doesn't stain, overall a great product. I would, without reservation, recommended this product to a friend or family member.
customer_reviews.author: Navyvette

customer_reviews.title: Best made mortar & pest I could find
customer_reviews.text: "I was using it at home and I loved it. My son who is a chef loved it so much I bought another one for him."
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: I have 2 cats and who like to climb everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I actually use it for a bottle/can holder on my desk! I have 2 cats and who like to climb everywhere. It has enough weight to it and is sturdy enough to stabilize it so they don't knock them over. I'm a crafter so I am sure somewhere down the line I will find the pestle as a useful tool.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle M. Toupence

product_meta.title: EZ-Grip Silicone & Porcelain Mortar and Pestle With Non-Slip Detachable Silicone Base - NEW DESIGN - Dishwasher Safe by Cooler Kitchen
product_meta.description:
Size:4.5 Inch| Color:White/BlackThe mortar & pestle is an ancient tool that's been around for millennia, with the earliest ones found dating back to 35,000 BC. Through the ages, this mechanism been used for hundreds of purposes from cooking to pharmacy & pharmacology to masonry, and is a utensil that no modern kitchen should be without. Handy and convenient to use, mortar & pestles also add a touch of stoic flair to any kitchen décor. 

Our Cooler Kitchen EZ-Grip Mortar & Pestle WILL NOT SLIP or slide all over your counter every time you try to use it to crush. You need something that stays firmly in place! 

Our Mortar has a silicone base, to keep it firmly still while you grind. Also for added convenience, our Pessle has a silicone EZ-GRIP Handle to make it easier to get the perfect grip to easily grind. No more struggling to find the right grip! 

Great as a muddler to muddle ingredients for drinks. Crushing the fibers of herbs, as opposed to chopping through them (like with a spice grinder), releases the full range of essential oils, flavors and aromatics that they contain. 

Hand grinding is what gives chili and curry pastes that distinctive breadth and depth of flavor that you won't find if you're prepping ingredients with a food processor. 

Our Mortar & Pestle is the best for: powdering herbs, grains, spices, coffee, nuts, roots, teas, bread, crackers, biscuits, fine powders, chemistry and laboratory use, or even for crushing medications for pets and humans alike. Also ideal for unlocking the hidden oils in your pantry of dry spices. The sky is the limit! This Morter & Pestle is absolutely dishwasher safe, but also easy to clean in your sink with some soap and water. The apothecary-grade porcelain material is strong and non-porous. More versatile than a Japanese suribachi, Mexican granite molcajete, or Turkish or Thai mortars. pulverizer, crusher or pessel and base of mortor is covered in food grade black silicone and can take a pounding without breaking.
feature_bullets: APOTHECARY GRADE PORCELAIN- Pharmacies traditionally use non-porous porcelain to grind medication - with great reason. Consider these common issues: wood absorbs the taste of the previous grind - yuck! Marble or granite create marble powder- gross! Stone is is hard to clean, and you can't use soap to wash it! Stainless Steel can rust! Our perfectly designed, easy to clean porcelain mortar and pestle allows you to grind your spices, nuts, coffee, muddle drinks, human or pet medication, guacamole,

DISHWASHER SAFE - EASY TO CLEAN AND BUILT TO LAST: Our dishwasher safe mortar and pestle will stand up to repeated cleaning and won't absorb odors or transfer flavors. The unglazed grinding surface prevents the mechanism from flaking or powdering. Porcelain is the ideal material to use as a smasher to grind anything.

GREAT FOR ARTHRITIS AND WRIST INJURIES! OUR EZ-GRIP PESTLE & SILICONE MORTAR BOWL ENSURES A FIRM, STRONG GRIP AND PREVENTS SLIDING - Don't buy another mortar & pestle where the mortar slips and slides on your counter. You need something that stays firmly in place! Our mortar set has a silicone base, to keep it still while you use it. The pestle has a silicone handle to make it easier to grind. No more struggling to find your grip! You'll wish you had bought this mortar & pestle years ago.

USEFUL IN ANY HOME KITCHEN OR TO GRIND MEDICATION - GREAT FOR: powdering herbs, grains, spices, nuts, seeds, teas, bread, biscuits (for making homemade bread crumbs!), science experiments, or even crushing medicines for pets (great for your dog!) and humans alike. Ideal for unlocking the hidden oils in your everyday dry spices.
PRODUCT MEASUREMENTS: Mortar- 4.5 inches across, 3.25 inches tall; Pestle- 5.5 inches tall. Add To Cart Now!
